Track Wakeup

expose_all <- function (package) {
    attachname <- paste0(package, "_all")
    while (attachname %in% search()) detach(attachname, character.only = TRUE)
    pkgns <- loadNamespace(package)
    attach(pkgns, name = attachname)
    invisible(pkgns)
}
library(GenomicFeatures)

Track Wakeup

gr <- GRanges("chr12", IRanges(1:4 * 10 + 1, width = 5))
mcols(gr) <- data.frame(check.names = FALSE,
    Location = "",
    Chromosome = 12, Start = start(gr), End = end(gr),
    Description = "",
    "What's for?" = "Unknown"
)
track <- BlockTrack(gr)
w.track <- wakeupTrack(track)

trackSpec(track)
## $background
## NULL
## 
## $height
## [1] 30
## 
## $label
## [1] "gr"
trackSpec(w.track)
## $background
## NULL
## 
## $height
## [1] 30
## 
## $label
## [1] "gr"
track@Display
## list()
w.track@Display
## $tnt.board.track.feature.block
## MultiArgs of length 0
## 
## $color
## function (d) {return d.color;}
## 
## $index
## function (d) {return d.key;}
## 
## $domain
## NULL
## 
## $on
## MultiArgs of length 2
track$color
## [1] "blue" "blue" "blue" "blue"
w.track$color
## [1] "#0000FF" "#0000FF" "#0000FF" "#0000FF"
compileTrack(track)

Misc-PinTrack-Compilation

ptrack <- PinTrack(GRanges("chr21", IRanges(1:2, width = 1), value = runif(2)))
## Warning in runif(2): '.Random.seed' is not an integer vector but of type
## 'NULL', so ignored
compileTrack(ptrack)
## JSCascade Object:
## ------
## tnt.board.track()
##  .label("GRanges(\"chr21\", IRanges(1:2, width = 1), value = runif(2))")
##  .color("#FFFFFF")
##  .height(40)
##  .display(tnt.board.track.feature.pin()
##    .color(function (d) {return d.color;})
##    .index(function (d) {return d.key;})
##    .domain([0,1])
##    .on("click", tnr.tooltip_callback("GRanges(\"chr21\", IRanges(1:2, width = 1), value = runif(2))", "value")))
##  .data(tnt.board.track.data.sync()
##    .retriever(tnr.pos_data_retriever(tnr.scale_val([
##            {
##              "pos": 1,
##              "tooltip": {
##                "value": 0.1426
##              },
##              "color": "#FF0000",
